name: Stickman Racer Road Draw 2
description: Stickman Racer Road Draw 2 is a legendary survival game where you have to do cool stunts on different vehicles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer: 32bit / 64bit Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
